name: Snail Racer EXTREME
description:
Come play this extremely addictive and fun snail racing game and see if you can dominate the steam score boards!
New beach mode available.
Glide through obstacles standing in your way!
Collect lettuce to gain more fuel and be sure to not let it run too low.
Snail size increases the further you progress.
how far can you get?

Good Luck and have fun

Features

Bonus lettuce for more points and fuel
Over 30 unique obstacles.
Snail hunger for fuel. Eat lettuces to go further
Bonus beach mode
Steam high scores
Upgrade your snail
Use or avoid boosters to go different speeds.
Get bonus scores from going further distances
